meanings.definition: A slang term for an umbrella.
meanings.sent1: I always keep my brolly in my bag in case it rains.
meanings.sent2: She opened her brolly as soon as the rain started.
meanings.sent3: The brolly turned inside out in the strong wind, making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her colorful brolly stood out in the sea of black umbrellas.
meanings.sent5: The brolly shielded her from the harsh sun, providing much-needed shade.

meanings.definition: To carry or use an umbrella.
meanings.sent1: He brollied his way through the storm, staying dry.
meanings.sent2: They always brolly when it's cloudy to be safe.
meanings.sent3: She brollied even when the sun was shining, just for fun.
meanings.sent4: The city brollied under a canopy of umbrellas during the downpour.
meanings.sent5: Brollying along the street, he felt prepared for any weather changes.
